alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 9:45AM CST until February 18 at 3:52PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Cahaba River At Centreville affecting Perry, Bibb and Dallas Counties. .Heavy rainfall has occurred over the past 24 hours over the Cahaba River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Cahaba River . Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cahaba River At Centreville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Pasture lands begin to flood in the Centreville area. The river walk next to the Commerce building and school is nearly completely flooded by this stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 20.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 24.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
